# INCarDefrosterResolutionResult

**Class**

A resolution result for which defroster to use in a car.

## Declaration

```swift
class INCarDefrosterResolutionResult
```

## Overview

An [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCarDefrosterResolutionResult] object is what you return when resolving parameters containing a [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCarDefroster] value. Use the creation method that best reflects your ability to successfully resolve the parameter. For additional resolution options, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INIntentResolutionResult].

## Creating a Resolution Result Object

- **success(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution involves the successful matching of the specified parameter.
- **confirmationRequired(with:)**: Creates an object whose resolution requires that the user must confirm the value before proceeding.

## CarPlay Resolution Results

- **INCarSeatResolutionResult**: A resolution result for a specific seat of the car.
- **INCarAudioSourceResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the audio source to use in a car.
- **INCarAirCirculationModeResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the air circulation mode to use in a car.
- **INRadioTypeResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the type of radio to use in a car.
- **INRelativeReferenceResolutionResult**: A resolution result for a choice between the next or previous option.
- **INRelativeSettingResolutionResult**: A resolution result for whether you can select the minimum, current, or maximum value.

## Inherits From

- INIntentResolutionResult

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
